english.segment2: Everlasting. While Earthly ages fade. In mercy. Our God Your kingdom reigns
english.segment4: Lord over everything. You are near. All of the universe at Your feet
english.segment6: In the Saviour. Injustice brought to right. For Your glory. That Your name be lifted high
english.segment8: Lord over everything. You are near. All of the universe at Your feet. Lord over everything. You are near. All of the universe at Your feet
english.segment10: The lost are found. The blind will see. The lame will walk. The dead will live. And You Are God. Forever You will reign. The lost are found. The blind will see. The lame will walk. The dead will live. And You Are God. Forever You will reign.
